contentList.content: You have honed your senses to the utmost degree. You gain a +[1] bonus to Initiative, can't be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SURPRISED">Surprised</LSTag>, and attackers can't land <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> against you.
A magical barrier protects you from harm, making you resistant to all forms of damage. Incoming damage is reduced by [1].
Bolster your allies against the dangers that lie ahead.

Hit point maximum increased by [1].

When you roll a 1 on an Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw, you can reroll the die and must use the new roll.

You can see in the dark up to [2].
You are immune to being <LSTag Tooltip="CharmedGroup">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Gain an additional bonus action.

While in combat, you heal [1] every turn, and restore [2] Ki Point(s).
